00028 //----------------------------------------------------------
00029 GrFrustum::GrFrustum( const MVec3& lookPoint, const MVec3& lookDir, const MVec3& nearBottomLeft, const MVec3& nearTopLeft,
00030         const MVec3& nearTopRight, const MVec3& nearBottomRight, const MVec3& farBottomLeft, const MVec3& farTopLeft,
00031         const MVec3& farTopRight, const MVec3& farBottomRight, float nearDist, float farDist )
00032 : _pos( lookPoint )
00033 , _nearBottomLeft( nearBottomLeft )
00034 , _nearTopLeft( nearTopLeft )
00035 , _nearTopRight( nearTopRight )
00036 , _nearBottomRight( nearBottomRight )
00037 , _farBottomLeft( farBottomLeft )
00038 , _farTopLeft( farTopLeft )
00039 , _farTopRight( farTopRight )
00040 , _farBottomRight( farBottomRight )
00041 , _isHull( true )
00042 {
00043         MVec3 leftDir = ( farBottomLeft - nearBottomLeft ).Cross( nearTopLeft - nearBottomLeft );
00044         MVec3 rightDir = ( nearTopRight - nearBottomRight ).Cross( farTopRight - nearTopRight );
00045         MVec3 topDir = ( farTopLeft - nearTopLeft ).Cross( nearTopRight - nearTopLeft );
00046         MVec3 bottomDir = ( farBottomRight - nearBottomRight ).Cross( nearBottomLeft - nearBottomRight );
00047 
00048         AddCullPlane( MPlane( leftDir, nearTopLeft ) ); 
00049         AddCullPlane( MPlane( rightDir, nearBottomRight ) );    
00050         AddCullPlane( MPlane( topDir, nearTopLeft ) );  
00051         AddCullPlane( MPlane( bottomDir, nearBottomRight ) );   
00052         AddCullPlane( MPlane( lookDir, _pos + ( nearDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );    
00053         AddCullPlane( MPlane( -lookDir, _pos + ( farDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );    
00054 }
00055 
00056 //----------------------------------------------------------
00057 GrFrustum::GrFrustum( const MVec3& lookPoint, const MVec3& bottomLeft, const MVec3& topLeft, const MVec3& topRight,
00058                                           const MVec3& bottomRight, const MVec3& lookDir, float nearDist, float farDist )
00059 : _pos( lookPoint )
00060 , _nearBottomLeft( bottomLeft )
00061 , _nearTopLeft( topLeft )
00062 , _nearTopRight( topRight )
00063 , _nearBottomRight( bottomRight )
00064 , _isHull( true )
00065 {
00066         B_ASSERT( lookDir.MagSqr() > 0.99f && lookDir.MagSqr() < 1.01 );
00067 
00068         MVec3 leftDir = ( bottomLeft - lookPoint ).Cross( topLeft - lookPoint );
00069         MVec3 rightDir = ( topRight - lookPoint ).Cross( bottomRight - lookPoint );
00070         MVec3 topDir = ( topLeft - lookPoint ).Cross( topRight - lookPoint );
00071         MVec3 bottomDir = ( bottomRight - lookPoint ).Cross( bottomLeft - lookPoint );
00072 
00074         AddCullPlane( MPlane( leftDir, lookPoint ) );   
00075         AddCullPlane( MPlane( rightDir, lookPoint ) );  
00076         AddCullPlane( MPlane( topDir, lookPoint ) );    
00077         AddCullPlane( MPlane( bottomDir, lookPoint ) ); 
00078         AddCullPlane( MPlane( lookDir, lookPoint + ( nearDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );       
00079         AddCullPlane( MPlane( -lookDir, lookPoint + ( farDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );       
00080 
00082         _farBottomLeft = farDist * ( bottomLeft - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00083         _farTopLeft = farDist * ( topLeft - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00084         _farTopRight = farDist * ( topRight - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00085         _farBottomRight = farDist * ( bottomRight - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00086 }
00087 
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------
00089 GrFrustum::GrFrustum( const MVec3& lookPoint, const SQuad& quad, const MVec3& lookDir, float nearDist, float farDist )
00090 : _pos( lookPoint )
00091 , _nearBottomLeft( quad.pos )
00092 , _nearTopLeft( MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up ) )
00093 , _nearTopRight( MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up ) + MVec3( quad.right ) )
00094 , _nearBottomRight( MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.right ) )
00095 , _isHull( true )
00096 {
00097         B_ASSERT( false );      
00098         B_ASSERT( lookDir.MagSqr() > 0.99999f && lookDir.MagSqr() < 1.00001 );
00099 
00101 //      MVec3 bottomLeft = _nearBottomLeft; //MVec3( quad.pos );
00102 //      MVec3 topLeft = _nearTopLeft; //MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up );
00103 //      MVec3 topRight = _nearTopRight; //MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up ) + MVec3( quad.right );
00104 //      MVec3 bottomRight = _nearBottomRight; //MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.right );
00105         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearBottomLeft - lookPoint ).Cross( _nearTopLeft - lookPoint ), lookPoint ) );         
00106         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearTopRight - lookPoint ).Cross( _nearBottomRight - lookPoint ), lookPoint ) );       
00107         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearTopLeft - lookPoint ).Cross( _nearTopRight - lookPoint ), lookPoint ) );           
00108         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearBottomRight - lookPoint ).Cross( _nearBottomLeft - lookPoint ), lookPoint ) );     
00109         AddCullPlane( MPlane( lookDir, _pos + ( nearDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );                            
00110         AddCullPlane( MPlane( -1.0f * lookDir, lookPoint + ( farDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );        
00111 
00113         _farBottomLeft = farDist * ( _nearBottomLeft - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00114         _farTopLeft = farDist * ( _nearTopLeft - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00115         _farTopRight = farDist * ( _nearTopRight - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00116         _farBottomRight = farDist * ( _nearBottomRight - lookPoint ) + lookPoint;
00117 }

00120 GrFrustum::GrFrustum( const GrFrustum& frustum, const SQuad& quad, const MVec3& lookDir, float nearDist, float farDist )
00121 : _pos( frustum._pos )
00122 , _planes( frustum._planes )
00123 , _farBottomLeft( frustum._farBottomLeft )
00124 , _farTopLeft( frustum._farTopLeft )
00125 , _farTopRight( frustum._farTopRight )
00126 , _farBottomRight( frustum._farBottomRight )
00127 , _nearBottomLeft( quad.pos )
00128 , _nearTopLeft( MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up ) )
00129 , _nearTopRight( MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up ) + MVec3( quad.right ) )
00130 , _nearBottomRight( MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.right ) )
00131 , _isHull( frustum._isHull )
00132 {
00133         B_ASSERT( false );      
00134         B_ASSERT( lookDir.MagSqr() > 0.99999f && lookDir.MagSqr() < 1.00001 );
00135 
00138 //      MVec3 bottomLeft = MVec3( quad.pos );
00139 //      MVec3 topLeft = MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up );
00140 //      MVec3 topRight = MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.up ) + MVec3( quad.right );
00141 //      MVec3 bottomRight = MVec3( quad.pos ) + MVec3( quad.right );
00142 
00143         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearBottomLeft - _pos ).Cross( _nearTopLeft - _pos ), _pos ) );                
00144         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearTopRight - _pos ).Cross( _nearBottomRight - _pos ), _pos ) );              
00145         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearTopLeft - _pos ).Cross( _nearTopRight - _pos ), _pos ) );                  
00146         AddCullPlane( MPlane( ( _nearBottomRight - _pos ).Cross( _nearBottomLeft - _pos ), _pos ) );    
00147         AddCullPlane( MPlane( lookDir, _pos + ( nearDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );                                    
00148         AddCullPlane( MPlane( -1.0f * lookDir, _pos + ( farDist + 0.00001f ) * lookDir ) );                             
00149 }

00204         float dist = plane.Dist( _pos );

00217 void
00218 GrFrustum::GetCrossSection( UFastArray< MVec3 >& hull, const MPlane& plane ) const
00219 {
00221         B_ASSERT( false );
00222 
00226 
00228         UFastArray< MVec3 > points;
00229         MVec3 curPoint;
00230         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00231         {
00233                 for ( unsigned int j = i+1; j < 6; ++j )
00234                 {
00238                         if ( plane.GetIntersect( curPoint, _planes[ i ], _planes[ j ] ) )
00239                         {
00240                                 points.Push( curPoint );
00241                         }
00242                 }
00243         }

00248

00252 //----------------------------------------------------------
00253 void
00254 GrFrustum::GetPerpCrossSection( UFastArray< MVec3 >& hull, float dist ) const
00255 {
00258         const MVec3& lookDir = GetCullPlane( ECP_NEAR ).GetNormal();
00259         MPlane plane( lookDir, _pos + dist * lookDir );
00260 
00262         plane.GetIntersect( hull.Push(), GetCullPlane( ECP_BOTTOM ), GetCullPlane( ECP_LEFT ) );
00263 
00265         plane.GetIntersect( hull.Push(), GetCullPlane( ECP_TOP ), GetCullPlane( ECP_LEFT ) );
00266 
00268         plane.GetIntersect( hull.Push(), GetCullPlane( ECP_TOP ), GetCullPlane( ECP_RIGHT ) );
00269 
00271         plane.GetIntersect( hull.Push(), GetCullPlane( ECP_BOTTOM ), GetCullPlane( ECP_RIGHT ) );
00272 }

00328 //----------------------------------------------------------
00329 bool
00330 GrFrustum::IsSphereInside( const MVec3& pt, float radius ) const
00331 {
00333 //      if ( _pos.DistSqr( pt ) > ( ( _farDist + radius ) * ( _farDist + radius ) ) )
00334 //              return false;
00335 
00337         const unsigned int planeCount = _planes.GetElemCount();
00338         for ( unsigned int plane = 0; plane < planeCount; ++plane )
00339         {
00340                 if ( _planes[ plane ].Dist( pt ) < -radius )
00341                         return false;
00342         }
00343         return true;
00344 }

00346 //----------------------------------------------------------
00347 bool
00348 GrFrustum::IsPointInside( const MVec3& pt ) const
00349 {
00350 //      if ( _pos.DistSqr( pt ) > ( _farDistSqr ) )
00351 //              return false;
00352 
00354         const unsigned int planeCount = _planes.GetElemCount();
00355         for ( unsigned int plane = 0; plane < planeCount; ++plane )
00356         {
00357                 if ( _planes[ plane ].Dist( pt ) < 0.0f )
00358                         return false;
00359         }
00360         return true;
00361 }

00363 //----------------------------------------------------------
00364 bool
00365 GrFrustum::IsAABoxInside( const MAABox& box ) const
00366 {
00367         MVec3 pts[ 8 ];                 
00368         box.GetCorners( pts );
00369 
00371         const unsigned int planeCount = _planes.GetElemCount();
00372         for ( unsigned int plane = 0; plane < planeCount; ++plane )
00373         {
00375                 unsigned int pt = 0;
00376                 for ( ; pt < 8; ++pt )
00377                 {
00379                         if ( _planes[ plane ].Dist( pts[ pt ] ) > 0.0f )
00380                                 break;
00381                 }
00382 
00385                 if ( pt == 8 )
00386                         return false;
00387         }
00388 
00390         return true;
00391 }

00454 //----------------------------------------------------------
00455 int
00456 GrFrustum::FindRelativeLoc( const MPlane& plane ) const
00457 {
00458 /*
00460         int eyeSide = ( plane.Dist( _pos ) > 0.0f ) ? ( 1 ) : ( -1 );
00461         if ( eyeSide == -1 )
00462         {
00463                 if ( plane.Dist( _farBottomLeft ) > 0 )
00464                         return 0;
00465                 if ( plane.Dist( _farTopLeft ) > 0 )
00466                         return 0;
00467                 if ( plane.Dist( _farTopRight ) > 0 )
00468                         return 0;
00469                 if ( plane.Dist( _farBottomRight ) > 0 )
00470                         return 0;
00471         }
00472         else
00473         {
00474                 if ( plane.Dist( _farBottomLeft ) <= 0 )
00475                         return 0;
00476                 if ( plane.Dist( _farTopLeft ) <= 0 )
00477                         return 0;
00478                 if ( plane.Dist( _farTopRight ) <= 0 )
00479                         return 0;
00480                 if ( plane.Dist( _farBottomRight ) <= 0 )
00481                         return 0;
00482         }
00483 */
00484         static const float kEpsilon = 0.001f;
00485 
00487         int side = plane.GetSide( _nearBottomLeft, kEpsilon );
00488         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _nearTopLeft, kEpsilon ) )
00489                 return 0;
00490         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _nearTopRight, kEpsilon ) )
00491                 return 0;
00492         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _nearBottomRight, kEpsilon ) )
00493                 return 0;
00494         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _farBottomLeft, kEpsilon ) )
00495                 return 0;
00496         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _farTopLeft, kEpsilon ) )
00497                 return 0;
00498         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _farTopRight, kEpsilon ) )
00499                 return 0;
00500         if ( side != plane.GetSide( _farBottomRight, kEpsilon ) )
00501                 return 0;
00502 
00504         return side;
00505 }

00507 //----------------------------------------------------------
00509 int
00510 GrFrustum::FindRelativeLoc( const MVec3& pt0, const MVec3& pt1 ) const
00511 {
00512 /*
00515         if ( IsPointInside( pt0 ) )
00516         {
00517                 if ( IsPointInside( pt1 ) )
00518                         return 1;
00519                 else
00520                         return -1;
00521         }
00522         if ( IsPointInside( pt1 ) )
00523         {
00524                 if ( IsPointInside( pt0 ) )
00525                         return 1;
00526                 else
00527                         return -1;
00528         }
00529 
00532         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _planeCount; ++i )
00533         {
00534                 if ( _planes[ i ].Dist( pt0 ) <= 0.0f && _planes[ i ].Dist( pt1 ) <= 0.0f )
00535                         return -1;      //! entirely outside.
00536         }
00537 */
00539         int inside = ( IsPointInside( pt0 ) ? 1 : 0 ) + ( IsPointInside( pt1 ) ? 1 : 0 ) - 1;
00540         if ( inside >= 0 )
00541                 return inside;
00542 
00546         const unsigned int planeCount = _planes.GetElemCount();
00547         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < planeCount; ++i )
00548         {
00549                 MVec3 intersectPoint;
00550                 if ( _planes[ i ].GetSegmentIntersect( intersectPoint, pt0, pt1 ) )
00551                 {
00555                         unsigned int j = 0;
00556                         for ( ; j < planeCount; ++j )
00557                         {
00559                                 if ( j == i )
00560                                         continue;
00561 
00562                                 if ( _planes[ j ].Dist( intersectPoint ) < -0.001f )
00563                                 {
00565                                         break;
00566                                 }
00567                         }
00568 
00571                         if ( j == planeCount )
00572                                 return 0;
00573                 }
00574         }
00575 
00577         return -1;
00578 }

00580 //----------------------------------------------------------
00581 bool
00582 GrFrustum::IsFrustumInside( const GrFrustum& frustum ) const
00583 {
00585         if ( frustum.FindRelativeLoc( _farBottomLeft, _pos ) >= 0 )
00586                 return true;
00587         if ( frustum.FindRelativeLoc( _farTopLeft, _pos ) >= 0 )
00588                 return true;
00589         if ( frustum.FindRelativeLoc( _farTopRight, _pos ) >= 0 )
00590                 return true;
00591         if ( frustum.FindRelativeLoc( _farBottomRight, _pos ) >= 0 )
00592                 return true;
00593 
00594         if ( FindRelativeLoc( frustum._farBottomLeft, frustum._pos ) >= 0 )
00595                 return true;
00596         if ( FindRelativeLoc( frustum._farTopLeft, frustum._pos ) >= 0 )
00597                 return true;
00598         if ( FindRelativeLoc( frustum._farTopRight, frustum._pos ) >= 0 )
00599                 return true;
00600         if ( FindRelativeLoc( frustum._farBottomRight, frustum._pos ) >= 0 )
00601                 return true;
00602 
00604         return false;
00605 }
00606 
00607 //----------------------------------------------------------
00608 bool
00609 GrFrustum::IsPolygonInside( const GrPolygon& polygon ) const
00610 {
00614         const unsigned int planeCount = _planes.GetElemCount();
00615         for ( unsigned int plane = 0; plane < planeCount; ++plane )
00616         {
00618                 unsigned int vertexCount = polygon.GetVertexCount();
00619                 unsigned int vertex = 0;
00620                 for ( ; vertex < vertexCount; ++vertex )
00621                 {
00623                         if ( _planes[ plane ].Dist( polygon.GetVertex( vertex ).position ) > 0.0f )
00624                                 break;
00625                 }
00626 
00629                 if ( vertex == vertexCount )
00630                         return false;
00631         }
00632 
00634         return true;
00635 }
00636 
00637 //----------------------------------------------------------
00638 bool
00639 GrFrustum::IsTriangleInside( const SVec3& p0, const SVec3& p1, const SVec3& p2 ) const
00640 {
00644         int neg = 0;
00645         const unsigned int planeCount = _planes.GetElemCount();
00646         for ( unsigned int plane = 0; plane < planeCount; ++plane )
00647         {
00649                 if ( _planes[ plane ].Dist( p0 ) > 0.0f )
00650                         continue;
00651                 if ( _planes[ plane ].Dist( p1 ) > 0.0f )
00652                         continue;
00653                 if ( _planes[ plane ].Dist( p2 ) > 0.0f )
00654                         continue;
00655 
00656                 return false;
00657         }
00658 
00660         return true;
00661 }
00662 
00663 //----------------------------------------------------------
00664 bool
00665 GrFrustum::IsRayInside( const MRay& ray, float epsilon ) const
00666 {
00668         if ( IsPointInside( ray.GetStart() ) )
00669                 return true;
00670 
00672         MVec3 intersect;
00673         unsigned int planeCount = _planes.GetElemCount();
00674         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < planeCount; ++i )
00675         {
00676                 if ( ray.Intersect( intersect, _planes[ i ], 10000.0f ) )
00677                 {
00678                         if ( _planes[ i ].GetNormal().Dot( ray.GetDir() ) < 0.0f )
00679                         {
00680                                 if ( IsPointInside( intersect - epsilon * ray.GetDir() ) )
00681                                         return true;
00682                         }
00683                         else
00684                         {
00685                                 if ( IsPointInside( intersect + epsilon * ray.GetDir() ) )
00686                                         return true;
00687                         }
00688                 }
00689         }
00690 
00692         return false;
00693 }
00694

00696 void
00697 GrFrustum::DebugDraw() const
00698 {
00699 /*
00700         bglUseProgramObjectARB( 0 );
00701         bglDisable( GL_BLEND );
00702         bglActiveTexture( 0 );
00703         bglDisable( GL_TEXTURE_2D );
00704         bglActiveTexture( 1 );
00705         bglDisable( GL_TEXTURE_2D );
00706         bglActiveTexture( 2 );
00707         bglDisable( GL_TEXTURE_2D );
00708         bglActiveTexture( 3 );
00709         bglDisable( GL_TEXTURE_2D );
00710         bglActiveTexture( 4 );
00711         bglDisable( GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP );
00712         bglActiveTexture( 5 );
00713         bglDisable( GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP );
00714         CHECK_GL();
00715 */
00716         bglBegin( GL_LINES );
00717         bglVertex3f( _pos.GetX(), _pos.GetY(), _pos.GetZ() );
00718         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00719         bglVertex3f( _farBottomLeft.GetX(), _farBottomLeft.GetY(), _farBottomLeft.GetZ() );
00720         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00721         bglVertex3f( _pos.GetX(), _pos.GetY(), _pos.GetZ() );
00722         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00723         bglVertex3f( _farTopLeft.GetX(), _farTopLeft.GetY(), _farTopLeft.GetZ() );
00724         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00725         bglVertex3f( _pos.GetX(), _pos.GetY(), _pos.GetZ() );
00726         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00727         bglVertex3f( _farTopRight.GetX(), _farTopRight.GetY(), _farTopRight.GetZ() );
00728         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00729         bglVertex3f( _pos.GetX(), _pos.GetY(), _pos.GetZ() );
00730         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00731         bglVertex3f( _farBottomRight.GetX(), _farBottomRight.GetY(), _farBottomRight.GetZ() );
00732         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00733 
00734         MVec3 midBottomLeft( 0.5f * ( _farBottomLeft - _pos ) + _pos );
00735         MVec3 midTopLeft( 0.5f * ( _farTopLeft - _pos ) + _pos );
00736         MVec3 midTopRight( 0.5f * ( _farTopRight - _pos ) + _pos );
00737         MVec3 midBottomRight( 0.5f * ( _farBottomRight - _pos ) + _pos );
00738 
00739         bglVertex3f( midBottomLeft.GetX(), midBottomLeft.GetY(), midBottomLeft.GetZ() );
00740         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00741         bglVertex3f( midTopLeft.GetX(), midTopLeft.GetY(), midTopLeft.GetZ() );
00742         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00743         bglVertex3f( midTopLeft.GetX(), midTopLeft.GetY(), midTopLeft.GetZ() );
00744         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00745         bglVertex3f( midTopRight.GetX(), midTopRight.GetY(), midTopRight.GetZ() );
00746         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00747         bglVertex3f( midTopRight.GetX(), midTopRight.GetY(), midTopRight.GetZ() );
00748         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00749         bglVertex3f( midBottomRight.GetX(), midBottomRight.GetY(), midBottomRight.GetZ() );
00750         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00751         bglVertex3f( midBottomRight.GetX(), midBottomRight.GetY(), midBottomRight.GetZ() );
00752         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00753         bglVertex3f( midBottomLeft.GetX(), midBottomLeft.GetY(), midBottomLeft.GetZ() );
00754         bglColor4ub( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
00755 
00756         bglEnd();
00757         CHECK_GL();
00758 }
